title: Not able to post in level 5 plus forum despite being level 5
body: As title says-My account is level 5 but I am not able to post in Roleplaying (Level 5 and up)

replies.body:
I do believe the level required for Roleplay is in fact level 5. When you first tried to post there, your boards level may not have synced up with your Summoner level yet. Once you posted here, those levels synced up, and you should be able to freely post in Roleplay now! 

BTW! What champion were you wanting to RP ^_^?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=II1kFNen,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-15T23:11:08.388+0000)
>
> I do believe the level required for Roleplay is in fact level 5. When you first tried to post there, your boards level may not have synced up with your Summoner level yet. Once you posted here, those levels synced up, and you should be able to freely post in Roleplay now! 
> 
> BTW! What champion were you wanting to RP ^_^?

Swain. Favorite champion :^)
